job_tasks.phrase: Je werk aan projecten voor geavanceerde besturingssystemen voor machine- en apparatenbouw en systeemintegratie.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes working on advanced operating systems and system integration, which are core software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je maakt graag realtime applicaties met embedded besturingssystemen
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the creation of real-time applications with embedded operating systems, a clear software development task.
This directly states working on diverse software solutions, a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Applicatiesoftware en/of embedded software implementeren in een project
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions implementing application and embedded software, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase indicates working with LLM, AI, and ML technologies within a software development context, suggesting their integration or application into software solutions.
Optimizing code with compilers is a standard software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Actief bezig zijn in de innovatieve machine- en apparatenbouw en systeemintegratie
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights active involvement in machine/device construction and system integration, which are software engineering domains.

soft_skills.justification: Working in multidisciplinary teams implies collaboration and interaction with professionals from different backgrounds.

soft_skills.phrase: Je kennis ontwikkelen door trainingen en cursussen
soft_skills.justification: Directly mentions developing knowledge through training and courses, indicating a focus on learning and skill development.
Gaining experience in multidisciplinary teams highlights the importance of collaboration and teamwork.

profile.rationale: The job description primarily focuses on core software engineering tasks such as developing real-time and embedded applications, system integration, and code optimization. While it mentions working with LLM, AI, and AI technologies, these are not detailed as specialized AI development or GenAI tasks. The role appears to be a software engineering position that incorporates AI/LLM as part of its broader software solutions, fitting the AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines core software engineering responsibilities. The mention of AI/LLM is brief and general, making the exact nature of AI involvement slightly ambiguous, but the overall context strongly points to a software engineering role with AI integration.
